text: The men's 400 metres hurdles event at the 1992 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Seoul, Korea, at Olympic Stadium on 16, 17 and 18 September. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Ashraf Saber ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Sammy Biwott ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| William Porter ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 18 September {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
